channel.title: How Do I?
channel.description: hello, i am new at private servers, and i want to know how to make shops work, and fix ranged, and add in monster like the kq and mini games and stuff

item.title: How Do I?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

ok,
it will look like this but i think with onther number and names…,

spawn = 1200 3253 3426 0 3255 3428 3255 3428 1 Tyras Guard

just to edit chance the monster NPC type the npc id thats 1200 in this code.
to chance the place edit the numbers right of it, 3253 3426 in this code.

thats it…,
